radiographic_examinations.findings: Right PICC remains in place. Cardiomediastinal contours are unchanged. Improvement in the degree of atelectasis at the left base and development of minimal linear atelectasis at the right base. Persistent to slightly increasing small left pleural effusion. Evidence of previous left breast surgery.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Improvement in the degree of atelectasis at the left base; development of minimal linear atelectasis at the right base; persistent to slightly increasing small left pleural effusion.
